example.name: transitive
example.text: Four years ago , he jailed all nine members of the Cambria County School Board for several hours after they defied his order to extend the school year by several weeks to make up for time lost during a teachers ' strike .
example.arg: his order to extend the school year by several weeks to make up for time lost during a teachers ' strike

example.name: inanimate subject
example.text: The move defied a law , approved in Moscow this month , banning such walkouts .
example.arg: a law , approved in Moscow this month , banning such walkouts

predicate.note: Frames file for 'defy' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.
